subject: Television
Actors and Actresses
Lacrosse
Native Americans
lead_paragraph: Harry J. Smith, a Mohawk, was a star box lacrosse player before he became known as Jay Silverheels and played Tonto in the TV series “The Lone Ranger.”
snippet: Harry J. Smith, a Mohawk, was a star box lacrosse player before he became known as Jay Silverheels and played Tonto in the TV series “The Lone Ranger.”
